about.details:
Incorporated in 2007, Surevin BPO Services Ltd (SBSL) provides business process outsourcing services to clients in India. They are one of the leading certified service providers of IT solutions and Business services, outsourcing services, digital solutions and marketing, data enrichment and management service, skill development and training program and HR consultancy.

Surevin offers IT solution and business services including inbound and outbound call center, voice broadcast, and document digitalization services and other outsourcing services, digital solutions and marketing services, data enrichment and management services, skill development and training programs and human resource consultancy services. They also offers lifecycle management, technology and infrastructure, back office, HRO, financial and insurance, telecom and training, and other services.

Currently SBSL is focusing on outsourcing services that include inbound and outbound call, software development and providing optical fibre cabling to Reliance, Idea and BSNL. They also provides principal services in sectors like BFSI, Government Agencies, Telecom, Technology and media industries, back office services, HRO services, Training etc.

faqs.question: What is the Surevin IPO?
faqs.answer:
Surevin IPO is a SME IPO of 912000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹3.65 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹40 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on July 28, 2017, and closes on August 1, 2017.

Sharex Dynamic (India) Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Surevin IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Surevin IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Surevin IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Surevin IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Surevin IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.answer: Surevin IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Surevin IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Surevin IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
